channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KS

item.title: Report X-2024100943
item.description:
Report X-2024100943

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-17T09:14:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-08
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: TWILIGHT RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO DOOR 70 UNLOAD FOR A LEAKING HAZ-MAT PACKAGE. RESPONDER PICKED UP THE LEAKING PACKAGE AND BROUGHT IT BACK TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER EVALUATION. RESPONDER NOTED THAT 1 OF THE 4 BOTTLES WAS LEAKING DUE TO A LOOSE CAP.

item.title: Report X-2024100952
item.description:
Report X-2024100952

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-17T09:14:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-08
  • City: WICHITA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LOADER NOTICED STAIN ON PACKAGE AS SHE TRIED TO REMOVE HAZMAT PAPERS, THEN CALLED A RESPONDER. RESPONDER DISCOVERED CORRUGATED PACKAGE WITH FLAMMABLE 3 DIAMOND LABEL LEAKING A SMALL AMOUNT ON ONE SIDE. INSIDE WERE TWO CORRUGATED BOXES, EACH WITH A 5 LITER PLASTIC BOTTLE INSIDE. ONE LID WAS LOOSE WITH A LOOSE SEAL. THAT BOX LEAKED ON THE OTHER INNER BOX.

item.title: Report X-2024100819
item.description:
Report X-2024100819

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-16T09:16:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-02
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKER WAS CALLED INTO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER OUTSIDE DOOR 297. RESPONDER READ THE DECSION TREE TO FIND APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER FOLLOWED GUIDLINES ON RESPONSE SHEET TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL. RESPONDER BROUGHT BACK THE LEAKER TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.
